introducao: Bem-vindo à Lesson 3. Hoje você vai aprender demonstrativos, plurais, cores e o alfabeto.

Lesson3_01_This_That_and_Chart.text: Usamos 'this' para algo próximo e 'that' para algo distante. Vamos praticar.
What colour’s this pencil? This pencil’s black.
What colour’s that pencil? That pencil’s white.
Where’s this pencil? This pencil’s on the chart.
Where’s that pencil? That pencil’s on the wall.
Vamos aprender os números de 11 a 15.
There are fifteen books on the table.

Lesson3_02_Plural_and_WeAre.text: Plural indica mais de um. Normalmente adicionamos 's' ao final das palavras.
What’s the plural of book? The plural of book is books.
What’s the plural of clock? The plural of clock is clocks.
What’s the plural of wall? The plural of wall is walls.
Are we sitting? Yes, we’re sitting.
Where are we sitting? We’re sitting on the chairs.
Are we standing? No, we’re sitting.

Lesson3_03_TheyAre_and_Negatives.text: Usamos 'they are' para 'eles são' ou 'elas estão'.
Are they standing? Yes, they’re standing.
Where are they standing? They’re standing in front of the house.
Are they sitting? No, they’re standing.
São formas contraídas de 'we are not' e 'they are not'.
Are we sitting on the floor? No, we aren’t sitting on the floor; we’re sitting on the chairs.
Are they standing behind the house? No, they aren’t behind the house; they’re in front of it.
Are we standing? No, we aren’t; we’re sitting.

Lesson3_04_Colors_and_Demonstratives.text: Essas são cores básicas em inglês: vermelho, azul, amarelo e cinza.
What colour’s this pencil? This pencil’s red.
What colour’s that pencil? That pencil’s blue.
What colour’s this book? This book’s yellow.
Usamos 'these' para plural próximo e 'those' para plural distante.
What colour are these pencils? These pencils are black and green.
What colour are those pencils? Those pencils are white and brown.
Where are those pencils? Those pencils are on the wall.

Lesson3_05_People_and_Numbers.text: O plural de 'man' é 'men', e o plural de 'woman' é 'women'.
What’s the plural of man? The plural of man is men.
What’s the plural of woman? The plural of woman is women.
There are two men and two women.
Vamos praticar os números de 16 a 20.
There are twenty students in the room.

Lesson3_06_Clothes_and_Alphabet.text: Vamos aprender algumas roupas e acessórios comuns.
These are shoes, boots, socks, trousers, and jackets.
These are suits, shirts, ties, hats, and bags.
What’s this? It’s a hat. What are these? They’re trousers.
O alfabeto em inglês tem 26 letras. Vamos praticar algumas.

Lesson3_07_Vowels_Consonants_and_Order.text: As vogais em inglês são A, E, I, O, U. As outras letras são consoantes.
These are the five vowels: A, E, I, O, U.
Are these vowels? Yes, they are vowels.
Is the letter B a vowel? No, it isn’t; it’s a consonant.
Por fim, vamos falar sobre ordem alfabética.
Which letter’s before E? D is before E.
Which letter’s after I? J is after I.
Which letter’s before Z? Y is before Z.
Which letter’s after G? H is after G.
